templateDmTableSql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS bi_dwd.dwd_engine_multicall_log_dm_yyyymm (
                                    `master` varchar(32) NOT NULL COMMENT '发送者',
                                    `timestamp` bigint(13) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '日志产生时间',
                                    `create_time` bigint(13) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '语音创建时间',
                                    `answered_time` bigint(13) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '应答时间',
                                    `profile_create_time` bigint(13) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '通话开始时间',
                                    `hangup_time` bigint(13) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '挂断时间',
                                    `out_audio_bytes` bigint(13) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '语音上行流量',
                                    `in_audio_bytes` bigint(13) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '语音下行流量',
                                    `out_video_bytes` bigint(13) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '视频上行流量',
                                    `in_video_bytes` bigint(13) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '视屏下行流量',
                                    `call_type` int(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '1-语音，2-视频',
                                    `duration` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '时长,单位s',
                                    `action` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '流量产生动作',
                                    `member` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '成员',
                                    `network_type_id` int(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '流量类型(3G,4G,Wifi)',
                                    `isp_id` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'oper_ip IP地址庫 固网运营商字典维表dim_isp字典匹配自增获取',
                                    `country_id` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'oper_ip IP地址庫 国家字典表维表dim_country字典匹配自增获取',
                                    `region_id` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'oper_ip IP地址庫 省/地区维表dim_region字典匹配自增获取',
                                    `city_id` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'oper_ip IP地址庫 地市维表dim_city字典匹配自增获取',
                                    `app_plat_id` int(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '坐标登录处自取',
                                    `app_id` int(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'app_id',
                                    `app_version_id` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '坐标版本号（自取）',
                                    `year` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '年',
                                    `month` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '月',
                                    `day` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '日',
                                    `hour` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '小时',
                                    `store_id` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '分区',
                                    INDEX `idx_dwd_mutlticall_log_ds_date` (`year`, `month`, `day`),
                                    INDEX `idx_dwd_mutlticall_log_ds_range` (`store_id`)
                                ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
insertSelectSql:
INSERT INTO bi_dwd.dwd_engine_multicall_log_dm_yyyymm (
                                    `master`,
                                    `timestamp`,
                                    `create_time`,
                                    `answered_time`,
                                    `profile_create_time`,
                                    `hangup_time`,
                                    `out_audio_bytes`,
                                    `in_audio_bytes`,
                                    `out_video_bytes`,
                                    `in_video_bytes`,
                                    `call_type`,
                                    `duration`,
                                    `action`,
                                    `member`,
                                    `network_type_id`,
                                    `isp_id`,
                                    `country_id`,
                                    `region_id`,
                                    `city_id`,
                                    `app_plat_id`,
                                    `app_id`,
                                    `app_version_id`,
                                    `year`,
                                    `month`,
                                    `day`,
                                    `hour`,
                                    `store_id`
                                ) SELECT
                                    `master`,
                                    `timestamp`,
                                    `create_time`,
                                    `answered_time`,
                                    `profile_create_time`,
                                    `hangup_time`,
                                    `out_audio_bytes`,
                                    `in_audio_bytes`,
                                    `out_video_bytes`,
                                    `in_video_bytes`,
                                    `call_type`,
                                    `duration`,
                                    `action`,
                                    `member`,
                                    `network_type_id`,
                                    `isp_id`,
                                    `country_id`,
                                    `region_id`,
                                    `city_id`,
                                    `app_plat_id`,
                                    `app_id`,
                                    `app_version_id`,
                                    `year`,
                                    `month`,
                                    `day`,
                                    `hour`,
                                    `store_id`
                                FROM
                                    bi_ods.ods_engine_multicall_log_dm_yyyymm
                                WHERE
                                    1 = 1
                                AND `store_id` = ${store_id}
delete_yes_date: delete from bi_dwd.dwd_engine_multicall_log_dm_yyyymm where 1=1 AND store_id = ${statisDate}
delete_date: delete from bi_dwd.dwd_engine_multicall_log_dm_yyyymm where 1=1 AND store_id < ${statisDate}
